headline: Is Western Digital (WDC) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Western Digital (WDC) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Western Digital: Prime Value Pick Ahead Of Spin-off In This Expensive Market
summary: Western Digital's stock surged 35% YTD on strong Q1 earnings and plans to spin off flash/HDD segments, with potential for further upside. Read more here.
